page.title: 09 OUR PETS
page.content: {OUR PETS The pets we have today are mainly dogs and cats although some people have more stranger pets like tortoise and terrapins.There are people who have birds like canaries,mynah birds and zebra finches.Some people keep gold fish and other stranger fish.A lot of people in our village have horses. People also have mice,hamsters,rabbits and guinea pigs.The dogs are well treated in this village.In our class 7 people have dogs.Some people have 2 or 3.The total figure of dogs is 12.Dogs eat Chappie,Winalot,Pal,Bounce and Chum. Cats eat Go Cat,Munchies,Whiskas and Kit-e-Cat.Pets must be looked after properly.They must also have the food that they enjoy.Pets are kept for enjoyment and elderly people keep them for company.Some dogs are kept as a protection against burglars.
